author: PaulHigin
body: This change fixes the "InvokeOnRunspace method on remote runspace" test that fails on AppVeyor due to its reliance on implicit credentials.  This fix uses the same code as Remotely AppVeyor uses to create explicit credentials for use in remoting connections.

title: Fix host remote test InvokeOnRunspace to work with AppVeyor
